My dad comes in yesterday while Joe and I are wathcing venom and spider-man in the middle of a wonderful battle scene. He asks us if we want to go see A soccor game...I'm thinking ohh god I'm not much of a soccor fan. Then my dad tells me which two teams will be playing in houston on sunday and he said "Colombia Vrs. Mexico" I said hells yes I want to see them MexicanSpics eat Colombia's ass!! My dad hasn't seen his home team (Colombia) play in 40 years! He looked like a little boy that just got a toy and wanted to jump around. Yepp.

I love all my friends. I'm me, you're not. I know how i'm feeling. I'll show it the way i show it. But if my words not enough to prove it, then fuck, I don't know what is.

Thank you and everyone take very great care of themselves and I want to see all of you lovers when i get home next sunday.

So, tomorrows really the last day...no more "finals" bullshit cause as soon at that bell rings i'm *spating* on that damn floor and saying FUCK shcool. I've had one hell of a year. They're still my bestfriends and will be for the rest of my crapforsaken life...pssh soo i really WONT miss them cause they ain't goin nowhere! 

Yeah I was going to make this real short, but that was a failed mission.

Tomorrows last final determens if i'm going to have a great summer or not soo i'm going to stay up all night with (A.D.D.) if you catch my drift...Yeah well I love all you fucks. Bye fuckers.

Tidilysquat.
